title: Johnson's to lose? (with Chris Hanretty)
itunes:title: Johnson's to lose? (with Chris Hanretty)
description:
Chris Hanretty, consultant for Survation reacts to party manifestos and whether this really is a Brexit election. Plus polling with Bloomberg's Yuan Potts and government reporter Kitty Donaldson joins Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Caroline Hepker from the election campaign.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
